update coin_manage
coinType = #{cointype,jdbcType=TINYINT},
seque = #{seque,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coinName = #{coinname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

withSpotOnoff = #{withspotonoff,jdbcType=TINYINT},

SpotToYubiOnoff = #{spottoyubionoff,jdbcType=TINYINT},
yubiToSpotOnoff = #{yubitospotonoff,jdbcType=TINYINT},

mapper.select: SELECT cm.id, cm.cointype, cm.coinname, cm.cnname, cs.c2cPriceScale, cm.description, cm.imgurl, cs.yubiScale,cs.c2cNumScale,cs.calculScale,cs.withdrawScale,cs.minwithdrawNum,cs.minC2cTransAmt FROM coin_manage cm LEFT JOIN coin_scale cs ON cs.orderCoinType = cm.coinType AND cs.unitCoinType=-1
